info.name: Minimalist Facebook 2015
info.description:
New Facebook Design! Way minimalistic!
Changes everything, from the profile page to the chat windows!
>Tested on Chrome, Firefox and Opera April 2016.<
info.additionalInfo: This Style Includes: - New top bar! - Complete redesign of the profile page! - Totaly redesigned "Messages Tab" - New comments style - Rounded avatars - New chat style, with flat and elegant bubbles - Minimalistic buttons! - Custom font - And more! Hope you like it! NOTE: This style includes the free usage font Roboto but don't worry, only applies to this particular style, so you will not have fonts conflicts with other styles installed, keep in mind that the font is compressed, so I can only ensure that it will display correctly in English, French, Spanish, Catalan and Portuguese (that doesn't mean it doesn't work with other lenguages, either way you can disable it if you want). NOTE: Starting in the 2.0 version, this style suffer a considerable restyle, if you don't like it you can find the old one here http://pastebin.com/2w7dZFTr, but keep in mind that is outdated and might work poorly. /* ---- Warning! boring stuff! ---- */ Current Version: 2.0.5 Change Log: Version 1 - First version, an early state of the code Version 1.1 - Left column panels on the profile page bugs polished - "Add as a friend" button on sticky top bar fixed - Down arrow icon fixed - Some other little bugs fixed - The code has been compacted Version 1.2 - The profile page style have been aplied to the public person's pages - Fixed some bugs in the chat and the icons of the cover inteface - "Confirm friend request" in profiles redesigned. Version 1.3 - The profile page style have been aplied to Groups and Events - Fixed and error when a Busines Page havent a cover everything shows wrong. - The border animation on right column has been taked off - Fixed some icon issues from the 1.2 version Version 1.4 - The style now displays on "apps.facebook" - Nav bar hovers fixed - Timeline Preview popup redesigned Version 1.5 - Hovers on composers have been fixed - Fixed an error that separate in two lines the header of the composer on certain lenguages when it is loading content - "Loading posts"'s gif background now is transparent - Some paddings on profile cards adjusted - Comments on left column on Person's Pages restyled accord to the style Version 1.5.5 - "Loading posts" animation on home page adjusted - Facebook changes again the position of icons in the chat, fixed again - "More photos from Fulanito" style adjusted Version 1.6 - After a busy personal time, i could finally fix some of the bugs that were born with the latest facebook update, hopefully i will fix it all in a short time. - New animations on New Messages Tab hovers, on left column hovers at home and in the topbar sections. - All chat icons error fixed Version 1.6.1 - Chat icons fixed AGAIN Version 1.6.2 - Same Thing Version 1.7 - The Icons's problem permanently solved. - Significant design tweaks. - The custom messages tab is now working as supposed again. - Roboto font added! Version 1.7.1 - Minor bugs fixed - Added the choice to install or not the custom font Version 2.0 - New fresh design! - Cleaner view, collapsing things that you don't need to have always in sight - New topbar icons and disposition Version 2.0.1 - Now is posible to disable the custom font - Small fixes due Facebook recent changes Version 2.0.2 - Facebook added more chat inputs, I dindn't like the position of those so I redesigned it! Version 2.0.3 - Bug fix Version 2.0.4 - Series of bug fixed - The left sidebar has been adapted to the recent changes for en_us Version 2.0.5 - Bug fix (4-2016)

data.title: Few bugs to fix on new Facebook Update!
